alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 11:55AM MST until January 14 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM SATURDAY TO 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Lower Snake River Plain and Eastern Magic Valley, including but not limited to Pocatello, Blackfoot, American Falls, Shelley, Fort Hall, Burley, Rupert, Heyburn, and Oakley.. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until 2 PM MST this afternoon. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 2 PM Saturday to 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing and drifting snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: For the Blizzard Warning, travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. For the Winter Storm Warning, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain
